presentationTable.name: Facts - Active Enrollments
presentationTable.description: This folder provides metrics related to learner's Enrollment to various learning items that are active currently.

presentationColumns.name: Number of Learners - Active
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of all learners
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Number of Learners - Active

presentationColumns.name: Number of Enrollments - Active
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of Enrollments across all learning items by workers
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Number of Enrollments - Active

presentationColumns.name: Number of Course Enrollments - Active
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of courses enrolled by the learner
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Number of Course Enrollments - Active

presentationColumns.name: Number of Specialization Enrollments - Active
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of specializations enrolled by the learner
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Number of Specialization Enrollments - Active

presentationColumns.name: Number of e-learning Enrollments - Active
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of e-learnings enrolled by the learner
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Number of e-learning Enrollments - Active

presentationColumns.name: Average Learning Items per Learner - Active
presentationColumns.description: Provides the average number of learning item enrolled by all learners
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Average Learning Items per Learner - Active

localization.localizationKey: Average Learning Items per Learner - Active

presentationColumns.name: Number of Voluntary Enrollments - Active
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of voluntary learning Enrollments
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Number of Voluntary Enrollments - Active

presentationColumns.name: Number of Required Enrollments - Active
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of required learning Enrollments
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Number of Required Enrollments - Active

presentationColumns.name: Number of Overdue Enrollments
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of learning Enrollments that are past the due date
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Number of Overdue Enrollments

presentationColumns.name: Number of Not Started Enrollments
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of learning Enrollments that have been assigned but not started
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Number of Not Started Enrollments

presentationColumns.name: Number of In-Progress Enrollments
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of learning Enrollments that are started but not yet completed
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Learning Enrollments.Number of In-Progress Enrollments

presentationColumns.name: Number of Renewed Learning Assignments - Active
presentationColumns.description: Provides the count of Enrollments that are renewed
